Bred.desc: Unknown. Remains 0 after breeding. If true, causes it to stay near other horses with this flag set.

Tame.desc: True if the horse is tamed.

Temper.desc: Ranges from 0 to 100, increases with feeding. Higher values make the horse easier to tame.

OwnerUUID.desc: UUID of the player that tamed the horse.

ArmorItem.desc: Item worn in the armor slot.

SaddleItem.desc: Item worn in the saddle slot.
